Package de.dlr.proseo.ingestor.rest

Class ProductControllerDecorator

java.lang.Object
de.dlr.proseo.ingestor.rest.ProductControllerDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductController
@RestController @RequestMapping(value="/proseo/ingestor/{version}/products", produces="application/json") @Validated public class ProductControllerDecorator extends Object implements ProductController
Methods to manage product metadata in the database (Generated with springmvc-raml-parser v.2.0.5)

    List of all products filtered by mission, product class, start time range; the output will be ordered by the columns given in orderBy, and the resulting product list will only contain the records in the given range
